content: Hey can you shoot me the website in email since the Fun Nazi's won't let you post it? Thanx Bro. quote: Originally posted by 88miker: while on a surftrip to cali, i met a girl and was invited to her house in a place called el mirage in the mojave. when her father found out i was a civilian helicopter pilot he took me to a spot that his friend owns the land for in a town called adalanto.. it was amazing to say the least. we were able to poke around a bit and saw the f14 cockpit and componants from top gun, some james bond aircraft, some old russian hinds. i was able to snap some photos but didnt want to push my luck because we were actually lucky enough to get to walk inside the fences. it was pretty amazing though. if you want to check it out the weblink is **** Hot links are a violation of the TOS. Please do not post them again!
